circle.style: animation-duration: 3s; animation-iteration-count: infinite; animation-name: pulse; animation-timing-function: ease-in-out;
animation-duration: 3s; animation-iteration-count: infinite; animation-name: pulse; animation-timing-function: ease-in-out;
animation-duration: 3s; animation-iteration-count: infinite; animation-name: pulse; animation-timing-function: ease-in-out;
animation-duration: 3s; animation-iteration-count: infinite; animation-name: pulse; animation-timing-function: ease-in-out;

path.style: stroke: rgb(64, 150, 255); fill: rgb(64, 150, 255); animation: fadeInOut 4s infinite ease-in-out;
